alert.note: Alert for Southwest Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Iron County through 830 PM MDT... At 745 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 24 miles northwest of Enoch, or 26 miles northwest of Cedar City, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lund. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Salt Lake City.
